name: Summarize
semantic_context: Sum, count, max, etc. across items
natural_language_description: 这是 Summarize 节点。主要用于: Sum, count, max, etc. across items

fieldsToSummarize.name: fieldsToSummarize
fieldsToSummarize.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Summarize | 默认值: {'values': [{'aggregation': 'count', 'field': ''}]}

fieldsToSplitBy.name: fieldsToSplitBy
fieldsToSplitBy.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by
fieldsToSplitBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Group By | 作用: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by | 提示: Enter the name of the fields as text (separated by commas)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: continueIfFieldNotFound (值: None) - Whether to continue if field to summarize can't be found in any items and return single empty item, otherwise an error would be thrown
disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
